problem_text_cn: 如图,现有一个圆心角为90°,半径为12cm的扇形纸片,用它恰好围成一个圆锥的侧面(接缝忽略不计),则该圆锥的底面半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, there is a sector paper sheet with a central angle of N_0 and a radius of N_1, which just surrounds the edgeof a cone (the seam is ignored), then the radius of the bottom of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:圆锥的底面周长是:\frac{90π×12}{180}=6π．设圆锥底面圆的半径是r,则2πr=6π．解得:r=3．故选:B．
